comment._content: The image is dated 10/4/12 at the top.

comment.author: 11572312@N00
comment._content: WASHINGTON, Oct. 4. -- When Col. Roosevelt took the witness chair before the Senate sub-committee he plunged quickly into his explanation of his connection with campaign contributions after the preliminary questions Chairman Lapp asked him to tell what he knew about the alleged contributions of John D. Archbold withheld to the Republican National campaign fund in 1904. query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9F01E7D7113AE633A...
